tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
quoteText:
We will provide notice regarding any modifications by sending an email and/or posting an online notice on the Service, and asking Members to accept the new terms.
Unless stated otherwise, new terms shall be effective thirty days from the date of such notice.
